languages.text: Мостик: Лорд-капитан, мы увеличиваем расстояние, но по нам ведут беглый огонь! Задет борт, повреждены щиты... стойте, а это что?

traits.locale_text: Мостик: Лорд-капитан, мы увеличиваем расстояние, но друкари ведут беглый огонь! Задет борт, повреждены щиты... стойте, а это что?

languages.text: Bridge: Lord Captain, we are gaining distance, but they are firing at will! We're hit, shields are damaged— wait, what is that?
languages.original_text: Мостик: Лорд-капитан, мы увеличиваем расстояние, но по нам ведут беглый огонь! Задет борт, повреждены щиты... стойте, а это что?

traits.locale_text: Bridge: Lord Captain, we are gaining distance, but the Drukhari are firing at will! We're hit, shields are damaged... wait, what is that?
Bridge: Lord Captain, we are gaining distance, but the Drukhari are firing at will! We're hit, shields are damaged... wait, what is that?
Bridge: Lord Captain, we are gaining distance, but the Drukhari are firing at will! We're hit, shields are damaged— wait, what is that?
Bridge: Lord Captain, we are gaining distance, but the Drukhari are firing at will! We're hit, shields are damaged— wait, what is that?
Bridge: Lord Captain, we are gaining distance, but they are firing at will! We're hit, shields are damaged— wait, what is that?
Bridge: Lord Captain, we are gaining distance, but they are firing at will! We're hit, shields are damaged— wait, what is that?

languages.text: Puente: L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, nos estamos distanciando, ¡pero nos disparan! Nos han dado, escudos dañados... ¿Qué es eso?
languages.original_text: Bridge: Lord Captain, we are gaining distance, but they are firing at will! We're hit, shields are damaged— wait, what is that?

traits.locale_text: Puente: L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, nos estamos distanciando, ¡pero nos disparan! Nos han dado, escudos dañados... ¿Qué es eso?

languages.text: 舰桥：舰长大人，我们正在拉开距离，但敌方正在全力开火！我们被击中了，护盾受损——等等，那是什么？
languages.original_text: Bridge: Lord Captain, we are gaining distance, but they are firing at will! We're hit, shields are damaged— wait, what is that?

traits.locale_text: 舰桥：舰长大人，我们正在拉开距离，但敌方正在全力开火！我们被击中了，护盾受损——等等，那是什么？

languages.text: ブリッジ：ロード・キャプテン、距離を取っていますが、相手は好き放題攻撃してきます！攻撃を受けて、シールドが破損して…って、あれは何だ？
languages.original_text: Bridge: Lord Captain, we are gaining distance, but they are firing at will! We're hit, shields are damaged— wait, what is that?

traits.locale_text: ブリッジ：ロード・キャプテン、距離を取っていますが、相手は好き放題攻撃してきます！攻撃を受けて、シールドが破損して…って、あれは何だ？

languages.text: Brücke: Lord Captain, wir gewinnen Abstand, aber sie feuern unaufhörlich! Wir sind getroffen, Schilde beschädigt ... Moment, was ist das?
languages.original_text: Bridge: Lord Captain, we are gaining distance, but they are firing at will! We're hit, shields are damaged— wait, what is that?

traits.locale_text: Brücke: Lord Captain, wir gewinnen Abstand, aber sie feuern unaufhörlich! Wir sind getroffen, Schilde beschädigt ... Moment, was ist das?

languages.text: Passerelle : {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nous gagnons de la distance, mais ils tirent sans répit ! Nous sommes touchés, les boucliers sont endommagés... attendez, qu'est-ce que c'est que ça ?
languages.original_text: Bridge: Lord Captain, we are gaining distance, but they are firing at will! We're hit, shields are damaged— wait, what is that?

traits.locale_text: Passerelle : {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nous gagnons de la distance, mais ils tirent sans répit ! Nous sommes touchés, les boucliers sont endommagés... attendez, qu'est-ce que c'est que ça ?

languages.text: Köprü: Lord Kaptan, mesafeyi açmaya başlasak da serbest atış yapıyorlar! Vurulduk! Kalkanlarımız hasar aldı... Bu da ne?
languages.original_text: Bridge: Lord Captain, we are gaining distance, but they are firing at will! We're hit, shields are damaged— wait, what is that?

traits.locale_text: Köprü: Lord Kaptan, mesafeyi açmaya başlasak da serbest atış yapıyorlar! Vurulduk! Kalkanlarımız hasar aldı… Bu da ne?
